marketing.title: Marketing Cookies

header.subtitle: Comprehensive data protection in compliance with GDPR, EU regulations, and Swedish law
header.importantDescription: This privacy policy is designed to comply with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), Swedish Data Protection Act, and other applicable EU regulations. You have specific rights regarding your personal data, and we're committed to protecting your privacy.

overview.title: Data Controller & Overview
overview.description1: Bromander Global AB ("we," "our," or "us") is a Swedish technology holding company registered in Stockholm, Sweden. We own and operate digital products including AI Reliance Tracker and Smart Bookkeeping. As the data controller, we determine the purposes and means of processing your personal data.
overview.description2: This Privacy Policy complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), the Swedish Data Protection Act (2018:218), and other applicable EU and Swedish regulations. Each of our portfolio companies maintains its own specific privacy policy for their respective products and services.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.description: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds under GDPR Article 6:

legitimateInterest.title: 🟢 Legitimate Interest (Art. 6(1)(f))
legitimateInterest.description: Website analytics, security monitoring, and business communications

consent.title: 🔵 Consent (Art. 6(1)(a))
consent.description: Marketing communications, non-essential cookies, and newsletter subscriptions

contract.title: 🟣 Contract Performance (Art. 6(1)(b))
contract.description: Service delivery, customer support, and account management

legal.title: 🟠 Legal Obligation (Art. 6(1)(c))
legal.description: Tax reporting, regulatory compliance, and law enforcement requests

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.description: We collect personal data in the following categories:

identity.title: Identity & Contact Information
items: Full name, email address, phone number
Company name, job title, professional information
Address, postal code, country of residence

technical.title: Technical & Usage Data
items: IP address, browser type, device identifiers
Operating system, screen resolution, language preferences
Website navigation patterns, page views, time spent
Referral sources, search terms, click patterns

communication.title: Communication & Content
items: Email correspondence, chat messages, support tickets

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking Technologies
items: Social media pixels and tracking beacons
Local storage data and session information

specialData.title: Special Categories of Data
specialData.description: We do not intentionally collect special categories of personal data (health, racial/ethnic origin, political opinions, religious beliefs, biometric data) unless explicitly required and with your explicit consent.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.description: We process your personal data for the following purposes, always based on a valid legal ground:

serviceDelivery.title: Service Delivery & Customer Support
items: Responding to inquiries and providing support

marketing.title: Marketing & Communication
items: Sending newsletters and product updates (with consent)

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing & Third Parties
dataSharing.description: We may share your personal data with the following categories of recipients:

serviceProviders.title: Service Providers & Processors
items: Cloud Infrastructure: AWS, Google Cloud (data hosting)

legalRequirements.title: Legal Requirements
legalRequirements.description: We may disclose your data when required by law, court orders, or to protect our rights, users' safety, or comply with legal processes.

businessTransfers.title: Business Transfers
businessTransfers.description: In case of merger, acquisition, or sale, your data may be transferred as part of the business assets, with continued protection under this privacy policy.

weDoNot.title: We Do NOT:
items: Sell your personal data to third parties
Share data for third-party marketing without consent
Transfer data outside EU/EEA without adequate protections

yourRights.title: Your Data Protection Rights
yourRights.description: Under GDPR and Swedish law, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Right of Access (Art. 15)
access.description: Request access to your personal data and information about how we process it.

rectification.title: Right to Rectification (Art. 16)
rectification.description: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data.

erasure.title: Right to Erasure (Art. 17)
erasure.description: Request deletion of your personal data ('right to be forgotten').

restrict.title: Right to Restrict Processing (Art. 18)
restrict.description: Request limitation of processing in certain circumstances.

portability.title: Right to Data Portability (Art. 20)
portability.description: Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format.

object.title: Right to Object (Art. 21)
object.description: Object to processing based on legitimate interests or direct marketing.

howToExercise.title: How to Exercise Your Rights
howToExercise.responseTime: Response Time: Within 30 days (may be extended to 60 days for complex requests)
howToExercise.verification: We may need to verify your identity before processing your request. If we refuse your request, we'll explain why and inform you of your right to complain to the Swedish Authority for Privacy Protection (IMY).

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy:

accountData.title: Account Data
accountData.active: Active accounts: Until account deletion + 30 days for backup recovery
accountData.inactive: Inactive accounts: 3 years from last login, then automatic deletion

communication.title: Communication Data
communication.support: Customer support: 7 years (Swedish business record requirements)
communication.marketing: Marketing communications: Until consent withdrawal + 30 days

analytics.title: Analytics Data
analytics.performance: Performance data: 12 months for optimization purposes

legalFinancial.title: Legal & Financial
legalFinancial.legal: Legal documentation: As required by applicable law

security.title: Security Measures
security.description: We implement comprehensive technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data:

technical.title: Technical Safeguards
items: TLS 1.3 encryption for data in transit
AES-256 encryption for data at rest
Regular security audits and penetration testing

organizational.title: Organizational Measures
items: Regular staff training on data protection
Privacy by design and by default

breach.title: Data Breach Response
breach.description: In the unlikely event of a data breach, we will notify the Swedish Authority for Privacy Protection (IMY) within 72 hours and affected individuals without undue delay, as required by GDPR Article 33-34.

cookies.title: Cookies & Tracking
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your browsing experience. You can manage your cookie preferences at any time.

essential.title: Essential Cookies (Required)
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function and cannot be switched off.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies (Opt-in)
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website.
items: Page views and user journey tracking

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies (Consent Required)
marketing.description: Used to deliver personalized content and advertisements.

management.title: Cookie Management
items: Our cookie banner and preference center

portfolioCompanies.title: Portfolio Company Privacy Policies
portfolioCompanies.description: Each of our portfolio companies operates independently and maintains its own comprehensive privacy policy for their specific products and services. These policies follow the same high standards as this policy.

aiTracker.title: AI Reliance Tracker
aiTracker.description: Privacy-first digital wellness platform with local data storage and zero tracking philosophy.

smartBookkeeping.title: Smart Bookkeeping
smartBookkeeping.description: Financial management platform with bank-level security and encrypted data processing.

contact.title: Contact & Support
contact.description: For questions about this Privacy Policy, data processing, or to exercise your rights, please contact us:

complaint.title: File a Complaint
complaint.description: If you're unsatisfied with our response, you can file a complaint with:

policyUpdates.title: Policy Updates
policyUpdates.description: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Material changes will be communicated via email and prominently displayed on our website. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

quickResponse.title: Quick Response Guarantee
quickResponse.description: We aim to respond to all privacy-related inquiries within 5 business days and fulfill data subject requests within the GDPR-mandated 30 days (extendable to 60 days for complex requests).

header.subtitle: Comprehensive terms governing our services in compliance with EU consumer protection and Swedish law
header.importantDescription: These terms comply with EU Consumer Protection Directives, the Swedish Consumer Contracts Act, and are supervised by Konsumentverket (Swedish Consumer Agency). Your consumer rights are protected under Swedish and EU law.

overview.title: Company Information & Overview
overview.description1: Bromander Global AB is a Swedish technology holding company that owns and operates digital products including AI Reliance Tracker and Smart Bookkeeping. We provide corporate information services and act as a holding company for our portfolio of technology businesses.
overview.description2: These Terms of Service ("Terms") constitute a legally binding agreement between you ("User," "you," or "your") and Bromander Global AB regarding your use of our website, services, and any related content or materials.

company.definition: Refers to Bromander Global AB, a Swedish limited liability company.

consumer.definition: A natural person acting for purposes outside their trade, business, craft, or profession (as defined by EU Consumer Rights Directive).

services.definition: Our corporate website, information services, and any related digital services provided by Bromander Global AB.

distanceContract.definition: Any contract concluded between us and a consumer under an organized distance sales scheme without simultaneous physical presence (per Swedish Distance Contracts Act).

legalAgreement.title: Legal Agreement
legalAgreement.description: By accessing or using our website and services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy.

ageRequirements.title: Age and Capacity Requirements
items: You must be at least 18 years old to enter into these Terms
For users under 18, a parent or legal guardian must accept these Terms on your behalf
You must have the legal capacity to enter into binding contracts under Swedish law
If you represent a business, you confirm you have authority to bind that entity to these Terms

consumerRights.title: Consumer Rights Notice (EU/Sweden)
consumerRights.description: If you are a consumer (natural person acting outside your business), you have specific rights under EU and Swedish consumer protection laws that cannot be waived by these Terms. These rights take precedence over any conflicting terms.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: Bromander Global AB provides the following services through our corporate website:

gateway.title: 🔗 Portfolio Company Gateway
items: Links and redirects to portfolio company services

portfolioCompanies.title: Portfolio Companies
portfolioCompanies.description: Each portfolio company operates independently with separate terms:
portfolioCompanies.aiTracker: AI Reliance Tracker: Digital wellness platform

userObligations.title: User Obligations
userObligations.description: As a user of our services, you agree to comply with the following obligations:

permitted.title: ✅ Permitted Uses
items: Access and use our services for legitimate business or personal purposes
Provide accurate and complete information when requested
Maintain the confidentiality of any access credentials
Respect intellectual property rights and applicable laws
Use our services in good faith and in accordance with these Terms

accuracy.title: 📋 Information Accuracy
accuracy.description: You warrant that all information you provide is accurate, complete, and up-to-date. You must promptly notify us of any changes to your information.

security.title: 🔐 Security Responsibilities
items: Maintain reasonable security measures for your devices and connections
Immediately report any suspected unauthorized access
Do not share access credentials with unauthorized parties
Use updated and secure browsers and software

prohibitedUse.title: Prohibited Use
prohibitedUse.description: You are strictly prohibited from using our services for the following purposes:

illegal.title: Illegal Activities
items: Any illegal activity under Swedish, EU, or applicable international law
Fraud, money laundering, or financial crimes
Harassment, threats, or intimidation of individuals
Distribution of illegal or harmful content

technical.title: ⚠️ Technical Misuse
items: Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems
Interfering with or disrupting our services or servers
Reverse engineering, decompiling, or disassembling our software
Using automated systems (bots, scrapers) without permission
Transmitting malware, viruses, or harmful code

commercial.title: ⚡ Commercial Restrictions
items: Commercial use without explicit written permission
Using our services to compete with our business
Bulk data extraction or systematic downloading

enforcement.title: Enforcement
enforcement.description: Violation of these prohibitions may result in immediate termination of your access, legal action, and cooperation with law enforcement authorities.

ownership.title: 🏢 Our Ownership Rights
ownership.description: All intellectual property rights in and to our services belong to Bromander Global AB or our licensors, including:
items: Trademarks, service marks, and trade names ("Bromander Global," logos, etc.)
Copyrights in website content, text, graphics, images, and software
Trade secrets and proprietary business information

license.title: ✅ Your License Rights
license.description: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to:
items: Access and view our website content for personal or business purposes
Download and print content for non-commercial use (with attribution)
Contact us using provided communication channels
Link to our website from your own website (no deep-linking without permission)

restrictions.title: 🚫 Restrictions
items: No modification, reproduction, or creation of derivative works
No commercial use without explicit written permission
No reverse engineering of any software or systems
No removal of copyright notices or attribution
No use of our trademarks without authorization

userContent.title: User Content & Feedback
userContent.description: Any content, feedback, or suggestions you provide to us become our property and may be used freely for any purpose without compensation or attribution.

consumerRights.title: EU Consumer Rights
consumerRights.description: If you are a consumer under EU/Swedish law, you have specific rights that cannot be waived:

withdrawal.title: Right of Withdrawal (14 Days)
withdrawal.description: For distance contracts, you have the right to cancel within 14 days without giving reasons.
withdrawal.howTo: How to withdraw: Send clear notice to legal@bromanderglobal.com
withdrawal.deadline: Deadline: 14 days from contract conclusion or service commencement
withdrawal.effects: Effects: We will reimburse payments within 14 days of receiving withdrawal

preContractual.title: Pre-Contractual Information Rights
preContractual.description: Before entering any contract, you have the right to receive:
items: Total price including taxes and fees
Complaint handling and dispute resolution information

unfairTerms.title: Unfair Terms Protection
unfairTerms.description: Any terms that create significant imbalance in your disadvantage may be deemed unfair under EU Directive 93/13/EEC and Swedish Consumer Contracts Act. Such terms are not binding on you.

disputes.title: Consumer Disputes
disputes.description: For consumer disputes, you may contact:
disputes.arn: National Board for Consumer Disputes: arn.se

consumerRightsOverride.title: Consumer Rights Override
consumerRightsOverride.description: Nothing in these Terms limits your statutory consumer rights under Swedish or EU law. In case of conflict, consumer protection laws take precedence.

serviceWarranties.title: Service Warranties
serviceWarranties.description: Our services are provided "as is" but we warrant that:
items: Services will be provided with reasonable skill and care
Information provided will be materially accurate when published
We have the right to provide the services described
Services will comply with applicable Swedish and EU laws

businessLimitations.title: Liability Limitations (Business Users)
businessLimitations.description: For business users (non-consumers), our liability is limited as follows:
items: Total liability capped at fees paid in 12 months preceding the claim
No liability for indirect, consequential, or special damages
No liability for business interruption or lost profits
Claims must be brought within 2 years of the cause of action

unlimitedLiability.title: Unlimited Liability
unlimitedLiability.description: We do not limit liability for death, personal injury, fraud, or any other liability that cannot be limited under Swedish law.

thirdPartyContent.title: Third-Party Content
thirdPartyContent.description: We are not responsible for third-party websites, content, or services accessible through our platform. Links are provided for convenience only.

terminationByUs.title: Termination by Us
terminationByUs.description: We may terminate or suspend your access immediately for:
items: Violation of these Terms or applicable laws
terminationByUs.consumerNotice: For consumers, we will provide reasonable notice except in urgent situations.

terminationByYou.title: Termination by You
terminationByYou.description: You may terminate your use of our services at any time by:
items: Discontinuing use of our website and services

effects.title: Effects of Termination
items: All rights and licenses granted to you will cease
We may retain information as required by law or policy
Certain provisions survive termination (IP, liability, governing law)

modification.title: Modification Rights
modification.description: We may update these Terms to reflect changes in law, regulation, business practices, or service improvements. Updates will be published on this page with a revised "last updated" date.

consumerProtection.title: Consumer Protection (EU/Swedish Law)
consumerProtection.minorChanges: Minor Changes: Take effect immediately upon posting
consumerProtection.substantialChanges: Substantial Changes: 30 days advance notice via email or prominent website notice
consumerProtection.unfavorableChanges: Unfavorable Changes: You have the right to terminate without penalty
consumerProtection.continuedUse: Continued Use: Constitutes acceptance, but does not waive consumer rights

businessUsers.title: Business Users
businessUsers.description: For business users, continued use after posting constitutes acceptance of revised Terms. We recommend reviewing Terms periodically.

versionControl.title: Version Control
versionControl.description: Previous versions are archived and available upon request. The current version is always available at this URL with the effective date clearly displayed.

applicableLaw.title: 🇸🇪 Applicable Law
applicableLaw.description: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with:
items: Swedish law (primarily the Contracts Act and Consumer Contracts Act)
GDPR and other data protection regulations

consumerDisputes.title: Consumer Dispute Resolution
consumerDisputes.firstStep: First Step: Contact us directly at legal@bromanderglobal.com
consumerDisputes.swedishConsumers: Swedish Consumers: National Board for Consumer Disputes (ARN) - arn.se
consumerDisputes.euConsumers: EU Consumers: EU Online Dispute Resolution Platform - ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr
consumerDisputes.generalConsumers: General Consumers: Swedish Consumer Agency - konsumentverket.se

businessDisputes.title: Business Disputes
businessDisputes.jurisdiction: Jurisdiction: Swedish courts, with Stockholm District Court as first instance
businessDisputes.alternativeResolution: Alternative Resolution: Stockholm Chamber of Commerce Arbitration Institute
businessDisputes.language: Language: Proceedings in Swedish or English as agreed

limitationPeriod.title: Limitation Period
limitationPeriod.description: Claims must be brought within the limitation periods specified by Swedish law (generally 3 years for consumer claims, 10 years for contractual claims).

consumerRightsOverride.title: Consumer Rights Override
consumerRightsOverride.description: Nothing in these dispute resolution provisions limits your statutory consumer rights, including rights to bring proceedings in your country of residence.

contact.title: Contact & Support
contact.description: For questions about these Terms of Service or legal matters, please contact us:

regulatoryInfo.title: Regulatory Information
regulatoryInfo.companyRegistration: Company Registration: Swedish Companies Registration Office
regulatoryInfo.dataProtection: Data Protection: Swedish Authority for Privacy Protection (IMY)

termsEffective.title: Terms Effective
termsEffective.description: These Terms are effective as of the last updated date and remain in effect until modified or terminated in accordance with these provisions.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: If you need these Terms in an alternative format for accessibility reasons, please contact us and we will provide them in a suitable format within 5 business days.

header.subtitle: Comprehensive cookie usage and consent management in compliance with EU ePrivacy Directive and Swedish law
header.importantDescription: This policy complies with the EU ePrivacy Directive and Swedish Electronic Communications Act (ECA). The Swedish Post and Telecom Authority (PTS) supervises compliance. Your consent choices are respected and can be changed at any time.

overview.title: Controller Information & Overview
overview.description1: This Cookie Policy explains how Bromander Global AB uses cookies and similar technologies on our corporate website. We are committed to transparency and compliance with the EU ePrivacy Directive and Swedish Electronic Communications Act.
overview.description2: Each of our portfolio companies (AI Reliance Tracker, Smart Bookkeeping) maintains its own cookie policy for their respective services. This policy covers only the Bromander Global corporate website.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies & Similar Technologies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. Similar technologies include pixels, web beacons, local storage, and other tracking technologies that collect information about your interaction with our services.

httpCookies.title: 🍪 HTTP Cookies
httpCookies.description: Small text files stored in your browser that contain information about your visit and preferences.

pixels.title: 📊 Pixels & Web Beacons
pixels.description: Tiny invisible images that track when emails are opened or pages are viewed.

localStorage.title: 💾 Local Storage
localStorage.description: Browser storage that persists data locally on your device for enhanced functionality.

sessionStorage.title: 🔍 Session Storage
sessionStorage.description: Temporary storage that expires when you close your browser tab or window.

importantNotice.title: Important Notice
importantNotice.description: Under Swedish law, we need your consent before placing most cookies on your device. This policy explains which cookies require consent and how you can manage your preferences.

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Cookie Use
legalBasis.description: We process cookies based on the following legal grounds under EU and Swedish law:

strictlyNecessary.title: Strictly Necessary (No Consent Required)
strictlyNecessary.subtitle: Swedish ECA § 28 exemption for cookies that are strictly necessary for service provision:

consentRequired.title: Prior Consent Required (ePrivacy Directive)
consentRequired.subtitle: All other cookies require explicit consent before placement:

enforcement.title: Swedish Enforcement (2025)
enforcement.description: Swedish authorities (IMY/PTS) actively enforce cookie consent requirements. In April 2025, new guidelines prohibited "dark patterns" in consent interfaces, requiring equal treatment of "Accept" and "Reject" options.

cookieTypes.title: Cookie Categories We Use
cookieTypes.description: We use cookies in the following categories:

necessary.title: Strictly Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Essential for basic website functionality and security. Cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics & Performance Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand website usage and improve performance. Require consent.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Remember preferences and enhance user experience. Require consent.

marketing.title: Marketing & Social Media Cookies
marketing.description: Used for advertising and social media integration. Require explicit consent.

consentManagement.title: Cookie Consent Management
consentManagement.description: We comply with Swedish and EU requirements for cookie consent, following 2025 enforcement guidelines:

compliantInterface.title: Compliant Consent Interface
items: No pre-checked boxes for non-essential cookies

management.title: How to Manage Your Consent
management.initialVisit: Initial Visit: Cookie banner appears with clear accept/reject options
management.changePreferences: Change Preferences: Access cookie settings at any time via footer link
management.withdrawConsent: Withdraw Consent: Disable any non-essential cookies instantly
management.browserSettings: Browser Settings: Additional control through browser preferences

swedishCompliance.title: Swedish Law Compliance (2025)
swedishCompliance.description: Following IMY guidelines from April 2025, our consent mechanism avoids "dark patterns" and ensures genuine user choice. All consent is documented and can be audited.

ageRequirements.title: Age Requirements
ageRequirements.description: The digital age of consent in Sweden is 13 years. Users under 13 require parental consent for any data processing, including cookies that collect personal information.

thirdPartyServices.title: Third-Party Services & Cookies
thirdPartyServices.description: We carefully select third-party services and ensure they comply with EU/Swedish data protection laws:

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics 4 (GA4)
googleAnalytics.purpose: Purpose: Website analytics and performance monitoring
googleAnalytics.dataProcessing: Data Processing: EU servers, IP anonymization enabled

linkedinInsight.title: LinkedIn Insight Tag
linkedinInsight.purpose: Purpose: B2B marketing analytics and audience insights
linkedinInsight.dataProcessing: Data Processing: EU/US with Standard Contractual Clauses

cloudflare.title: CloudFlare CDN
cloudflare.purpose: Purpose: Performance, security, and DDoS protection
cloudflare.dataProcessing: Data Processing: EU servers, essential functionality

yourRights.title: Your Cookie Rights & Controls
yourRights.description: Under Swedish and EU law, you have comprehensive rights regarding cookies and tracking:

consentRights.title: Consent Rights
items: Give or refuse consent for non-essential cookies
Withdraw consent at any time without penalty
Granular control over different cookie categories
Consent choices respected across all visits

browserControls.title: Browser Controls
browserControls.chrome: Chrome: Settings → Privacy and security → Cookies and other site data
browserControls.firefox: Firefox: Preferences → Privacy & Security → Cookies and Site Data
browserControls.safari: Safari: Preferences → Privacy → Manage Website Data
browserControls.edge: Edge: Settings → Cookies and site permissions

transparencyRights.title: Transparency Rights
items: Clear information about all cookies we use
Purpose and duration of each cookie
Identity of third parties setting cookies
Data transfer information for international cookies

cookieImpact.title: Impact of Cookie Controls
cookieImpact.essential: Essential Cookies: Cannot be disabled; may prevent basic website functions
cookieImpact.analytics: Analytics Cookies: Website remains functional; we cannot improve user experience
cookieImpact.functional: Functional Cookies: May require re-entering preferences on each visit
cookieImpact.marketing: Marketing Cookies: Less relevant content and advertising

preferenceCenter.title: Cookie Preference Center
preferenceCenter.description: Access your cookie preferences at any time:
preferenceCenter.availability: Available in footer on every page

cookieTable.title: Complete Cookie Inventory
cookieTable.description: Comprehensive list of all cookies used on our website, as required by Swedish transparency obligations:

securityMeasures.title: Security Measures
items: HttpOnly flags to prevent JavaScript access where appropriate
SameSite attributes to prevent CSRF attacks
Regular security audits of cookie implementation

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.sessionCookies: Session Cookies: Deleted when you close your browser
dataRetention.persistentCookies: Persistent Cookies: Automatically expire after specified duration
dataRetention.analyticsData: Analytics Data: Aggregated and anonymized after 26 months
dataRetention.consentRecords: Consent Records: Maintained for 3 years for compliance purposes

dataMinimization.title: Data Minimization
dataMinimization.description: We follow GDPR data minimization principles, collecting only necessary cookie data and retaining it for the shortest time required for its stated purpose.

internationalTransfers.title: International Transfers
internationalTransfers.description: Some third-party cookies (Google Analytics, LinkedIn) may transfer data outside the EU. We ensure adequate protections through Standard Contractual Clauses and adequacy decisions.

updateProcess.title: Update Process
updateProcess.minorChanges: Minor Changes: Updated immediately with new "last updated" date
updateProcess.materialChanges: Material Changes: 30 days advance notice via email and website banner
updateProcess.newCookieCategories: New Cookie Categories: Fresh consent required before deployment
updateProcess.versionHistory: Version History: Previous versions archived for compliance audit

regulatoryCompliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
regulatoryCompliance.ePrivacyDirective: EU ePrivacy Directive: Implemented via Swedish ECA
regulatoryCompliance.gdpr: GDPR: Article 6 legal basis and Article 7 consent requirements
regulatoryCompliance.swedishAuthorities: Swedish Authorities: PTS (technical) and IMY (data protection) oversight
regulatoryCompliance.guidelines2025: 2025 Guidelines: Compliant with IMY dark patterns guidance

regularReviews.title: Regular Reviews
regularReviews.description: We conduct quarterly reviews of our cookie inventory, consent mechanisms, and compliance with evolving Swedish and EU requirements to ensure ongoing legal compliance.

technologyUpdates.title: Technology Updates
technologyUpdates.description: As cookie technology evolves (e.g., Topics API, Privacy Sandbox), we will update this policy and obtain fresh consent as required by Swedish law.

contact.title: Contact & Cookie Support
contact.description: For questions about cookies, consent management, or this policy, please contact us:

regulatoryAuthorities.title: Regulatory Authorities
regulatoryAuthorities.pts: Swedish Post & Telecom Authority (PTS): pts.se | Email: pts@pts.se
regulatoryAuthorities.imy: Swedish Authority for Privacy Protection (IMY): imy.se | Email: imy@imy.se

cookieManagement.title: Cookie Preference Management
cookieManagement.resetConfirm: This will reset all cookie preferences and reload the page. Continue?

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: If you need this Cookie Policy in an alternative format for accessibility reasons, please contact us and we will provide it in a suitable format within 3 business days.

policyEffective.title: Cookie Policy Effective
policyEffective.description: This Cookie Policy is effective as of the last updated date and applies to all visitors to our website. By continuing to use our website after reading this policy, you acknowledge understanding of our cookie practices.
